channel.title: Statistical Concepts on Peter Elliott
channel.description: Recent content in Statistical Concepts on Peter Elliott

item.title: Prediction, Estimation and Inference
item.description: In popular culture, statisticians are often thought of as people that like to describe things with numbers. For every event or phenomenon, a statistician can come up with a metric that describes it. From this perspective, a statistic is merely something that sheds a little light. There is relatively little awareness of the idea of statistical modeling, though this in fact is the bulk of what academic statistics is concerned with.
